results.title: Repurposing of cholesterol-lowering agents in status epilepticus: A neuroprotective effect of simvastatin.
results.text_hl: Repurposing of @CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@-lowering agents in @<m>DISEASE_Status_Epilepticus</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013226 @@@status epilepticus@@@: A neuroprotective effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@.

citations.NLM: Hanin A, Roussel D, Lecas S, Baudin P, Navarro V. Repurposing of cholesterol-lowering agents in status epilepticus: A neuroprotective effect of simvastatin. Epilepsy Behav. 2023 Apr;141():109133. PMID: 36813661

results.title: Administration of Simvastatin after Kainic Acid-Induced Status Epilepticus Restrains Chronic Temporal Lobe Epilepsy
results.text_hl: Administration of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ after @CHEMICAL_Kainic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007608 @@@Kainic Acid@@@-Induced @<m>DISEASE_Status_Epilepticus</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013226 @@@Status Epilepticus@@@ Restrains @DISEASE_Epilepsy_Temporal_Lobe @DISEASE_MESH:D004833 @@@Chronic Temporal Lobe Epilepsy@@@

citations.NLM: Xie C, Sun J, Qiao W, Lu D, Wei L, Na M, Song Y, Hou X, Lin Z. Administration of Simvastatin after Kainic Acid-Induced Status Epilepticus Restrains Chronic Temporal Lobe Epilepsy PLoS One. 2011;6(9):e24966. PMID: 21949812

results.title: The effects of simvastatin on hippocampal caspase-3 and Bcl-2 expression             following kainate-induced seizures in rats.
results.text_hl: In this study, we examined the neuroprotective effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ in a @SPECIES_10116 @@@rat@@@ model of @<m>DISEASE_Status_Epilepticus</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013226 @@@SE@@@ induced by @CHEMICAL_Kainic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007608 @@@kainic acid@@@ (KA).

citations.NLM: Sun J, Xie C, Liu W, Lu D, Qiao W, Huang Q, Huo Z, Shen H, Lin Z. The effects of simvastatin on hippocampal caspase-3 and Bcl-2 expression             following kainate-induced seizures in rats. Int J Mol Med. 2012 Oct;30(4):739-46. PMID: 22842798
